name: Proc-Maze
description:
Description

You control a color ball through a procedurally-generated maze.  Your task is to go through this maze and reach the golden star.

This will not be so easy, while the maze structure is always changing. Doors open and close, in a pseudo-random way.

You can either play solo (race against time) or play in a 2-player versus mode.

This game was performed during the ProcJam in October 2018 in less than 20 hours (3 hours a day)

Controls

All controls are performed with the keyboard. Everything is explained in details on the start screen.
